snippet: We're keeping an eye on how independents break and the second-place winner of New Hampshire's primary.
abstract: We're keeping an eye on how independents break and the second-place winner of New Hampshire's primary.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- Polls here will remain open for several more hours as the Republican candidates prepare to dash from the state.

headline.main: Things to Keep in Mind While Awaiting Results
